values: Q: How is the new patch going to affect the numbers below? A: Probably not much, PRI+ and Blue+ is completely unaffected anyway and suggested failstacks for green items were very low in the first place. There will be no update tho, since i have no idea what the numbers are (for either of the 2 new enhance modes)
If the suggested failstack numbers here are not to your liking check out Enhancement (Full), it contains a complete breakdown of costs for ALL failstacks for every grade (huge)

If anyone is interested in the tool i programmed, its available for download on the BDO forum (see link above). Last update unless prices change drastically. The difference for suggested failstacks is usually not that big anyway
See tab Cron Cost for thresholds and https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1WzAeIFslcWhZ-TudUTrvt4S6ejGF8Uo5FwVqNivfHK0/pubhtml for the published(faster?) document
I removed some jewelry items to reduce clutter. See the generic priced items (for prices inbetween take failstacks inbetween)

Values for Rods, Muskets and Horse Gear is based on the assumption that it uses the same values as Armor (past +5) with numbers for forcing adjusted (which seem to have been stealth adjusted, when i find the time i will update)
The displyed cost and number of fails assume that you continue trying until the item goes up, the additional failstacks generated in the process are already part of the calculation
